nodes.bodyText:
if the ! should be applied on all conditions, please add parenthesis around all.
I believe ! has a higher precedence than || and will be evaluated first without surrounding parenthesis; If this is the expected behavior, please change the first clause from !(requestName == EnrollmentMethods.updateStudyState.method.methodName) to (requestName != EnrollmentMethods.updateStudyState.method.methodName) to remove confusion.
Thanks, updated. && will early exit instead or ||.
